text.div:
Care Connect Human Language

A CodeSystem that identifies the language used by a person.

Copyright Statement: Copyright Â© 2016 HL7 UK

This code system https://hl7.org.uk/fhir/CodeSystem/CareConnect-HumanLanguage-1 defines the following codes:
